tooltip-destination: Choose from our curated list of popular destinations. Each location offers unique experiences and attractions.
tooltip-dates: Choose your check-in and check-out dates. Prices may vary based on the selected dates and availability.
tooltip-travelers: Specify the number of travelers and their ages (maximum 9 travelers). This helps us provide accurate pricing and recommendations for your group.
content-accordion-feature-medical: Comprehensive coverage for medical emergencies abroad, including hospitalization, medical consultations and emergency transfers.
content-accordion-feature-medicines: Reimbursement of medications prescribed during the trip, with coverage for essential and emergency medications.
content-accordion-feature-dental: Emergency dental care abroad, including pain relief treatments and dental emergencies.
content-accordion-feature-cancel: Compensation for flight cancellations, including reimbursement of hotel expenses and new tickets when necessary.
content-accordion-feature-loss: Compensation for loss, theft or damage to luggage during the trip, with coverage for personal items.
content-accordion-feature-preexisting: Coverage for pre-existing medical conditions, including monitoring and treatment of chronic illnesses during travel.
label-text-content-step-1: Complete your trip details to see exclusive offers.
label-text-content-step-2: Analyze the coverage and choose what you need to travel.
label-text-content-step-3: Review the data and pay for your international health insurance.
label-text-content-step-4: Receive the voucher with instructions for use in your email.
title-testimonials: We have accompanied thousands of incredible travelers
text-testimonials-1: Seriousness and instant compliance. They resolved my concern immediately.
text-testimonials-2: Excellent service and customer service. Highly recommended.
text-testimonials-3: The best travel assistance I have ever had. Very professional.
label-text-loader: More than 165 people are exploring this destination. Be the next to take advantage of the best offers!
whatsapp-message: Hello, I have a question about the travel insurance

validation.password: Password must have at least 8 characters, one letter and one number

dateRange.past: The date must be in the future
